A

addComment(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.CommentController
This is a method used to Add comment in a string which is sent in a Response Entity.
addComment(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.CommentService
Creates and returns a new Comment object that is made by a particular User on a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal on which the Comment has to be created, id of the User who is making a comment on the given Proposal and, Text of the Comment.
addProposal(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.ProposalController
This is a method used to Add proposal in a string which is sent in a Response Entity.
addTeam(Team) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.models.Proposal
Adds a Team to the Proposal.teams field of this Proposal using the specified Team object if Proposal.teams does not contain the specified Team object.
AuthenticationBean - Class in com.soprabanking.ips.authentication
Authentication Bean Returns the details of that user who attempting to login.
AuthenticationBean(String) - Constructor for class com.soprabanking.ips.authentication.AuthenticationBean
 
authenticationProvider() - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.config.MyConfig
this method implements DaoAuthentication to authenticate the user via database.
